front.title: Control Protocol Extensions for Setup of TDM Pseudowires in MPLS Networks

abstract.t: This document defines extension to the PWE3 control protocol [RFC4447] and PWE3 IANA allocations [RFC4446] required for setup of TDM pseudowires in MPLS networks. Vainshtein and Stein Standards Track [page 1] Control Protocol Extensions for TDM Pseudo wires November 2007
